trans-unit.source: Cancel the deletion of a certificate
trans-unit.target: Cancel the deletion of a certificate

trans-unit.source: Cancels a failed deletion of a certificate from the specified account.
trans-unit.target: Cancels a failed deletion of a certificate from the specified account.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to certificates.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to certificates.

trans-unit.source: Replace {certificate-thumbprint} with the thumbprint of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Replace {certificate-thumbprint} with the thumbprint of the certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you try to delete a certificate that is being used by a resource (Pool/TVM), the status of the certificate changes to <languageKeyword>deletefailed</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: If you try to delete a certificate that is being used by a resource (Pool/TVM), the status of the certificate changes to <languageKeyword>deletefailed</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: If you decide that you want to continue using the certificate, you can use this operation to set the status of the certificate back to active.
trans-unit.target: If you decide that you want to continue using the certificate, you can use this operation to set the status of the certificate back to active.

trans-unit.source: If you intend to delete the certificate, you do not need to run this operation after the deletion failed.
trans-unit.target: If you intend to delete the certificate, you do not need to run this operation after the deletion failed.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the certificate is not being used by any resources, and then you can try again to delete the certificate.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the certificate is not being used by any resources, and then you can try again to delete the certificate.
